con:part.con:content: <!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 rel. 2 (http://www.altova.com) by a.smotrova (quality-lab)--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:tns="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1" xmlns:ns="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1"> <wsdl:import namespace="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1" location="BankCreditScheme.xsd"/> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1" elementFormDefault="qualified"/> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CalcCreditRequest"> <wsdl:part name="ImportCreditParams" element="ns:importCreditParams"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CalcCreditResponse"> <wsdl:part name="ImportCreditResult" element="ns:importCreditResult"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RequestHeader"> <wsdl:part name="Header" element="tns:HeaderRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CreditType"> <wsdl:operation name="CreditCalculation"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CalcCreditRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:CalcCreditResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CreditBinding" type="tns:CreditType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="CreditCalculation"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:CreditCalculation"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:RequestHeader" part="Header" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:RequestHeader" part="Header" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CreditService"> <wsdl:port name="CreditPort" binding="tns:CreditBinding"> <soap:address location="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 rel. 2 (http://www.altova.com) by a.smotrova (quality-lab)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="http://creditcalculator.pointschool.ru/calculator/importCreditParams?ws=1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" schemaLocation="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xs:element name="importCreditParams"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Импорт входных параметров для расчета кредита</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Credit"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Amount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Сумма кредита</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Fee" type="tns:Fee"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Первоначальный взнос</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Term" type="tns:Term"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Период погашения в месяцах</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute ref="tns:client" use="optional" default="0"/> <xs:attribute ref="tns:PreviousConviction" use="optional" default="0"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="Fee"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Первоначальный взнос</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Сумма кредита</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="100000"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="500000"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Term"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Количество месяцев</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:minInclusive value="12"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="importCreditResult"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ответ на импорт с расчетом по параметрам</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs="0"> <xs:element name="ErrorType" type="tns:ErrorType"/> <xs:element name="ImportResult" type="tns:ImportResult"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="ErrorType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ошибка</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ErrorCode" type="tns:ErrorCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Код ошибки</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" type="tns:Description"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Описание ошибки</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="StackTrace" type="tns:StackTrace" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Стектрейс, выбрасываемый в случае возникновения исключения</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ImportResult"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Результат расчета кредита</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Interest" type="tns:Interest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Процент переплаты по кредиту</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MontlyPayment" type="tns:MonthlyPayment"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ежемесячный платеж</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OverPayments" type="tns:OverPayments"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Переплата, всего</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Total" type="tns:Total"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Общая сумма выплаты с учетом процентов</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="Interest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Процент по кредиту</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MonthlyPayment"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ежемесячный платеж</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OverPayments"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Переплата, всего</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Total"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Сумма к оплате, всего</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ErrorCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Код ошибки</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Description"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Описание ошибки</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="StackTrace"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Стектрейс, выбрасываемый в случае возникновения исключения</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:attribute name="client" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Является клиентом?</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PreviousConviction" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Был в заключении?</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:simpleType name="Date"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Текущая дата</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MessageGUID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Идентификатор сообщения</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="tns:GUIDType"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="GUIDType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>гуид</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="([0-9a-fA-F]){8}-([0-9a-fA-F]){4}-([0-9a-fA-F]){4}-([0-9a-fA-F]){4}-([0-9a-fA-F]){12}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="HeaderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Заголовок</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Date" type="tns:Date"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Текущая дата в формате ГГГГ-ММ-ДДTЧЧ:ММ:СС</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageGUID" type="tns:GUIDType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Идентификатор запроса</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="HeaderRequest" type="tns:HeaderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Заголовок запроса</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:schema>
